title: Kohan 2 Kings of War with 1.2.3 patch
description:
This was created by anthonor long time ago.
Since I can't find working torrent with latest (1.2.3) patch I decided to upload it.

Bare in mind my upload is 2 MB/S . Should be enough since this game is small.

However, please seed , to keep torrent alive.

This is not tasted on WIN 7 or any later WIN installment . So feel free to comment the results.

1- Unrar all
2- Mount and install 
3- Patch 1.1.4 to 1.2.3 
4- Unmount 
5- Install Gamejack v5.0.4.2
6- Launch Gamejack and use the keygen for a key or use this one ->FCQMT8-3VA9WM-A69BF5-UCHU64-VWDQ6D
note: you can copy/paste from the keygen to gamejack
7- Click on top left -> Game Starter
8- Click on top right -> Add new entry (icon with little yellow star on it )
9-  Click on the + sign beside your folders and go to -> C:Program FilesTimeGate Studios
10- Click on the folder -> Kohan II Kings of War
11- On the right window, Dbl left click on -> K2.exe
12- Click -> ok
13- On the installed game window, left click on -> K2.exe
14- On the top right, left click on the green arrow ( > ) to launch the game
15- At the game screen enter this serial key -> 7948-QFMF-MTK2-GM65
note: no space, include the ( - ) between each groups


Don't forget to launch the game from gamejack and not the desktop shortcut. You can use this for many other games...

PS: It's impossible to find a fix/nocd that works with the latest patch 1.2.3 witch was a MAJOR revision. 
That's why i included gamejack with this release
